Index » Path
  • (no frames)
Classes Files Methods Extras

    Quickly fuzzy find classes, mixins, methods, file:

    • Ctrl-T Open fuzzy finder dialog

    In frame mode you can toggle the list naviation frame on the left side:

    • Ctrl-L Toggle list view

    You can focus a list in frame mode or toggle a tab in frameless mode:

    • Ctrl-C Class list
    • Ctrl-I Mixin list
    • Ctrl-F File list
    • Ctrl-M Method list
    • Ctrl-E Extras list

    You can focus and blur the search input:

    • Ctrl-S Focus search input
    • Esc Blur search input

    In frameless mode you can close the list tab:

    • Esc Close list tab

    Class: Path

    Defined in: lib/Path._coffee

    Overview

    The class corresponding to a Neo4j path.

    Property Summary

    (Node) start Readonly

    The node that this path starts at.

    (Node) end Readonly

    The node that this path ends at.

    (Number) length Readonly

    The length of this path.

    (Array<Node>) nodes Readonly

    The nodes that make up this path.

    (Array<Relationship>) relationships Readonly

    The relationships that make up this path.
